message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $14,000 is closer to the value, I'm still looking for a bit more.  How about we settle at $16,000?
I'm still not comfortable with $16,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $14,000 and $16,000, so how about $15,000?
